key_features: Color Coded Thick Vinyl Coating For Comfortable And Non-Slip Feel
Hexagon Shaped Edges For Easy Storage And Prevent Rolling
ai_description: The product features brightly colored dumbbells with a smooth vinyl coating, primarily shown in pink but available in multiple colors including yellow, red, blue, and green. Each dumbbell has the KAKSS brand and weight (e.g., 0.5 KG, 1.5 KG) printed in white on hexagonal ends that prevent rolling. The dumbbells appear well-constructed with a cast-iron core and comfortable grip. Lifestyle images show them being used in home workouts alongside yoga mats, resistance bands, and other fitness equipment.
target_audience: fitness enthusiasts, home gym users, women (based on lifestyle images)
